section.name: What is YAAFI?
section.p: The Yet Another Avalon Framework Implementation.

YAAFI is a light-weight implementation of a service framework using the Avalon service lifecycle interfaces. There are a few other implementations out there such as Excalibur, Fortress and most notably Merlin but YAAFI gives you a lot of bells and whistles with minimal baggage. The goal of the implementation to implement light-weight Avalon container to be embedded into existing applications and/or other containers.

ul.li: run-time instrumentation to monitor application health
service initialization in a background thread
a light-weight Avalon container only depending an the Avalone Framwork libraries
a container following the Avalon Framework contract
ability to run components written for other Avalon containers
support for early or on-demand initialization
support for decryption of configuration files
